entry.title: Absence of Evidence
entry.content:
Antifragileé‡Œè¿™ä¸€æ®µï¼š

The â€œdo you have evidenceâ€ fallacy, mistaking evidence of no harm for no evidence of harm, is similar to the one of misinterpreting NED (no evidence of disease) for evidence of no disease.
